website_summaries.verdict: Responds to touch of the child, performing different tricks. Provides plenty of entertainment for pre-school aged kids.
pros: Sounds and music appeal to very young children
Customers report kids play with this toy day after day
Tough construction to handle rough treatment
cons: Some owners didn't like the poor sound quality
Very little appeal for school aged children

website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, touch-sensitive puppy. Fun with some nice features in spite of a few durability concerns.
pros: Responds to touch by walking, running, barking, and singing
Sings a handful of kiddie classics
Talks and responds appropriately to a variety of situations for somewhat realistic play
cons: Hard body may be more susceptible to damage when dropped

customer_reviews.title: She chases it and her favorite is to simply dance with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little puppy for my Grand-daughter and she absolutely loves this toy. She is very entertained by it and plays with it for hours. She chases it and her favorite is to simply dance with it. This little toy gets plenty of abuse from her playing with it and so far it has not fallen apart. I bought this item in December 2016 and this is March 2017. So, yes, if you have a little one, this little puppy is a great way to entertain them and the bonus is you will be entertained too by watching them play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Melissa Caudle

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst toy ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst toy ever. It is not worth the high price. It just talk and says hi I am Harry or whatever the name is and move a little and nothing really eapecial. It is not smart or anything and does not engage the child. Do not buy this product. I am so mad to spent this much money for this toy.
customer_reviews.author: BRK

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fun and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This little toy is quite delightful. My 2 year old loves it. It's sturdy, funny, and seems well made. It's been knocked around a couple months here in a house of 5 kids and still going strong. Definitely best for a toddler-age kid -- simple and cute.
customer_reviews.author: PieAndPoirot

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this almost 2 months ago to be prepared ahead of time for my kids' birthday, so I can't return it but it broke the very first day my kids played with it. It isn't doing the motion sensitive thing, it makes sounds over and over on repeat, but never finishes what it was doing and doesn't perform all features. I know my kids would have loved it had it worked right, but this project is a joke. I wish Amazon had an extended return policy for these kind of cases
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This toy kind of only does one thing, is cheaply made, and isn’t that interactive. It’s main function is to “run” and that’s about it. It farts if you hit it’s butt, which isn’t that great & squeals when you grab his tail. My step son who is 3 played with it once and was over it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Staser

customer_reviews.title: Annoying toy alert!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. This is an ANNOYING toy. My daughter kept picking it up, because it's easy that way, by its tail and it appropriately yelps. Luckily she got bored with it in 15 minutes. Money not well spent.
customer_reviews.author: j. thiele

customer_reviews.title: He LOVED it and so did his 4 year old brother
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little dog for my 2 year old grandson for his birthday! He LOVED it and so did his 4 year old brother! I just hope it doesn't get broken from them dropping it so much. My 2yr old squealed with delight over this little dog. Needless to say, I made the right choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: So Freaking Loud
customer_reviews.text: What sadistic person makes a kids toy that will go off from a slight breeze, with no volume control, and the default volume level could drown out a rock concert? It’s so loud we are going to donate it to a school for the deaf so they might experience sound for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS. WHEN U PICK IT UP BY THE ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. WHEN U PICK IT UP BY THE TAIL AS MY GRANDSON DOES HE BARKS AND AND CRIES TELLING THE CHILD IT HURTS. LOL. VERY ENTERTAINING. I WOULD BUY IT AGAIN. VERY VERY DURABLE TO. HE DROPS IT ALOT AND IT STILL KEEPS ON WORKING
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Poor instruction set
customer_reviews.text: Most people can bypass the horrible instruction set, shows the front to place 4 AAA batteries, which also per instructions state 3 AAA batteries. The clip makes inserting one battery a real pain. 3 & a 4 year old boys liked this toy, however. Given the lack of correct instructions, cant do better than 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Very poor packaging, toy doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a crumpled box. The Your Pet box, NOT an Amazon box. The lid was barely held shut with a single piece of cellophane tape. The toy looked okay, but when I pulled the battery strip, it didn't work. It had nothing in the box to hold it securely. I am exchanging it, and will update if the new one is better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbox and go. No work or tools required.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my one year old who loves to turn the Roomba robot on and off. So I realize that he needs something that moves. Although our place is mostly carpet, she found the most Joy when it was on the wood floors. The toy was ready to use as soon as I take it out of the box minus the tail falling apart in transit. I would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My little boy like it and it brought a bit of nostalgia for me and my husband as it brought back memories of the little brown dog on a red string that barked when you pulled it, that EVERY little kid had back in the early 80’s
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene Roeck

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy.
customer_reviews.text: My niece had autism & we saw this as a recommended toy online. She absolutely loved it & it keeps her entertained for hours. Have plenty of batteries on hand as you’ll need them. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: My little one was ecstatic to play with this. And thankfully the manufacturer includes batteries so it's ready to play as soon as he got it open. For the price I think this is a great addition to any child's toy box who enjoys dogs. Fairly tough too dispite having a couple flimsy feeling parts. Fell about 3 feet off a table and got thrown down a slide with no defects.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: a gift for our 2 1/2 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Well, once he figured out that the dog was not chasing him and he had control of where it went he loves it. He has been wanting a dog, so thought this might be a way to start. He feeds it and walks it now, and then puts it to bed.... a start of a relation ship between a dog and a boy that may lead to a live one as he gets older
customer_reviews.author: JohawkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Toy for 2 Yr Old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adorable toy for my granddaughter. She loves it and all of the sounds it plays.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old was thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Instant appeal for our 2 year old grandson, who carried it everywhere. However, he's a little too young to appreciate the 'training' features, and too impatient to let the doggie move around on its own. Seems pretty sturdy; it has survived several falls to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: BIG HIT with 2 1/2 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a 2 1/2 yr old little boy & he was laughing & dancing with it from the moment it turned on. It scared him when the dog rolled forward but the boy soon learned it also rolled back. I would say this is a great gift for a 2 1/2 to 4 1/2 yr old, but any older would most likely get bored quickly. I DO recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bendixsen

customer_reviews.title: Fun to run
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift for the toddler who likes to run. The talking toy will delight the child with encouraging conversation and lots of activity. A great, affordable gift.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cute. You won’t be disappointed. It arrives packaged well. It is cuter in person than in photos. I bought it for a two year old and he loves it. It is hard plastic so when he drags it through the house it doesn’t break. The sounds are cute the features are cute. It’s larger than expected. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly j

customer_reviews.title: Bhahaha great gift to annoy any parent
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old nephew loves this little guy. My sister on the other hand..... It’s a great gift if you have a little sister with kids and and to annoy her!
customer_reviews.author: Snoe

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my grandson with down syndrome. He just turned one and it scared him more than he liked it. It was pretty loud but I think he’ll enjoy it when he gets a little bit older. It seems to be of good quality and it was pretty large.
customer_reviews.author: Beki

customer_reviews.title: Great gift !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 5 year old. He absolutely loves it!! I read some of the other reviews & I must say that it is sturdier than I thought it would be. It is not cheaply made. It is a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Florida PlumberTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says which is ok.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat, but doesn't entertain for long although that could be because it only goes on hard surface floors. He plays with it on carpet so it says all the words or sings the songs, but doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: janthony

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Toy Dog for Children
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest toy dog. Quality is exceptional. Colors are vibrant and rich. Works beautifully as advertised. This is a gift for my grandson. He requested this toy for Christmas and I was so happy to find it at Amazon. Shipping on this toy was so quick and efficient. I just ordered it! It has already arrived! I am so excited for my grandson to open this on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter is still playing with this toy six months after Christmas. It's a lot of fun and is made decent. I get a kick out of watching her talk to the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Deejay

customer_reviews.title: Dirty when opened
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son for Christmas. It arrived but when we opened it on Christmas I noticed it looked dirty in some places like it had been played with and returned. Not sure if this was the case or not but I was pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not only does she love it, her 4 year old sister loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for 2 year old grandchild. Not only does she love it, her 4 year old sister loves it too! Great little toy!!
customer_reviews.author: char68

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old nephew loved his present! My niece of course (4 year old) enjoyed playing with it too. It's so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Ramer

customer_reviews.title: Boring little pup
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic, boring little pup is overpriced for what little it does.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: The kid LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a great nephew. He’s two 1/2 and he absolutely loves it. That’s exactly the outcome I was looking for, so this toy gets five stars from Auntie Roo lol
customer_reviews.author: AuntieRoo

customer_reviews.title: a Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a year and half old little boy. He loves, loves it. Had to have a leash so he could walk it !! Has not changed his mind since Christmas !! a Wonderful present

customer_reviews.title: Electric Dog Robot
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected but worked great and the 1 year old loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Mcree

customer_reviews.title: awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Great features 👏 My 17 months old toddler loved it. Great gifting idea 💡 too. Good value for money. Delivered on time in perfect condition 👌
customer_reviews.author: Sudhir

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: It's resilient, 2 year old grandson likes to pick it up by the tail. The dog says "ouch, that hurts" (or close) He loves it, very good learning toy

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Great grandson doesn't like real animals-lol. So maybe he will slowly decide to with this totally awesome puppy.

customer_reviews.title: Too loud

The reviews indicating that it was the 3rd best robot dog available was to me deceiving. Luckily it was not that expensive but still disapointing.

customer_reviews.title: This one doesn’t walk on carpet floors
customer_reviews.text: Dog is nice . Looks like a robo dog . Ha some music but this one does not walk on carpeted floor . So didn’t work for me . Otherwise good one to buy .

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: My baby brother loved it and played with it like it was a real Dog. This Toy also has cool features to keep him entertained at least for a while.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, sturdy, turns itself off in 30 seconds if not played with.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, sturdy, turns itself off in 30 seconds if not played with.

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed. I have carpet all around the house

customer_reviews.author: wyziwyg

customer_reviews.title: Cute fun and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase, I bought it for my daughter and she loves it. It’s the next best thing to having a pet if you can’t have a real.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This doggy is so cute and works well! Does so many different things by pressing lightly on the nose, tail or back. Any child would love it! Does not work well on carpets but will reverse itself on a floor if it runs into any object.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the little ones

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy

customer_reviews.title: It's the bomb!

Harry walks, barks, talks, sings, dances and makes other dog sounds. Kids will giggle for fun petting him
Cute dalmatian toy dog for your family fun. The sensor responds to touch. Good autism toy
Play and chase on smooth surfaces, Harry keeps walking with Bump n Go feature
Your satisfaction with electronic puppies is important to us
